full_text.full_text:
(Ex) Naïve Bayes Classifier (1/2)
▪ Consider the following data set
▪ Given a data instance x = (Home Owner = No, Marital Status = 
Married, Annual Income = 120K), how can we predict its class?
– The target attribute is Defaulted Borrower (whose value is Yes or No)
– To do this, we need to compute P(No|x) and P(Yes|x)

▪ Consider the following data set
▪ Given a data instance x = (Home Owner = No, Marital Status = 
Married, Annual Income = 120K), how can we predict its class?

– The target attribute is Defaulted Borrower (whose value is Yes or No)
– To do this, we need to compute P(No|x) and P(Yes|x)
